entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Clear. Blowing snow at times overnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Sunny. Blowing snow at times. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Blowing snow at times early in the evening. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 31 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023
